The statue previously stood near the First Lady’s hometown of Sevnica.

text:

He has been hit with hate crime robbery and assault charges for attacking a gay couple in the Bronx, officials said .

name: NYDailyNews
text:
Selena's family has repoetedly issued a cease-and-desist order to a man planning a Trump rally at her memorial in Texas.

Joe Michael Perez, the same man who put a Make America Great Again hat on the statue in June, is planning the event.
